text:
: Consumers can henceforth pay their bi-monthly power consumption charges at the e-service centres run by the Tamil Nadu Arasu Cable TV Corporation at the eight taluk offices in the district.

The facility to pay the charges to the Tangedco through the e-service centres has been introduced from January 11, Collector S.Palanisamy said in a press release.
title: e-service centres to accept power bills
